answers.answer: YEAY!! Tell her congrats for me.
Wow, that makes three December Mommies. Guess I need to wait untill Jan :)Congrats to her.
Thanks for the update peek.What a way to start the new year, with a healthy little boy.

question: Baby is a boy, named Charles Clinton Stanley (Charlie)weight: 8lbs 11ounceslength: 51cms (20 inches)time: 11:53 am Dec 27I'm sorry that I have no other details other than it was a C/Section (planned due to a previous section and gestational diabetes).Anyway, Congrats, Jody
title: Adevotee had her baby!
